name: Fighting For Fun
description:
Instructions

1. Click on the character faces to change the character.

2. Press spacebar (click on fighters) to start the fight.

3. Watch the fight.

4. Press spacebar (click on fighters) to start another fight.

WTF?

It's a pixel art fight simulator that replaces the mainstream coin flip.

This app was made to play with real people, mostly with family or friends. As part of my "for fun" series, I plan to make various "games" like this that simulate something so that people can try to guess the winner.

Simple entertainment that you can share with friends and family. I hope you enjoy it.
